page.title: 06ONE DAY FOR MRS EVANS
page.content: Mrs.Evans wakes at 7.30 a.m.,goes to the bathroom,washes and then dresses in trousers and a striped jumper.She comes downstairs and turns up the heating.In the kitchen she switches on the kettle,and then cuts sandwiches for her three sons to take for their school lunch.She wakes the boys at 8 a.m. and prepares their breakfasts.She washes the dishes,and then takes her youngest son,Alan,to Stockingford First School.She returns home and tidies the house.After this she goes by 'bus to visit her sister.She returns at 2.15 p.m. and prepares dinner.Collects Alan from school and gives the boys dinner--beef,potatoes, carrots and gravy,followed by bananas and custard.Watches T.V. until 8 p.m., then they have supper.Puts boys to bed at 8.30 p.m.She gets the childrens' clothes ready,cleans shoes.Bed 11 p.m.
